TopicTitle: convert a sandbox save in a science save

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I want to make a science save so I can have the science reports.

However, I already made a sandbox save where I built most of my ships, and my landings, planted flags and made a space station...

Is there any way to transfer my progress I made in the sandbox save to the science one?

The space station is a bit of a pain to build and replanting the flags will be long(not so long after all, but I would prefer to not doing it again).

Thank you for reading!

Edited August 14, 2014 by goldenpeach

Ok, I achieved to do it.

I simply copy/pasted a part of a science save(the "setting" part: from the beginning to the object discoverable) to the sandbox save(and deleting the corresponding part of the sandbox save of course).

If anyone need to do the same thing or doesn't understand what I just said, feel free to ask me more details!
